full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement
## Southwestern Ontario Food Catering Services for 31 Canadian Brigade Group
### Tender Information

* **Reference Number**: WS4549981590-Doc4550000842
* **Amendment Number**: 2
* **Tender Closing Date**: Monday, June 3, 2024, 14:00:00 Eastern Daylight Time (EDT)
* **Expected Contract Start Date**: Tuesday, September 1, 2024
* **Expected Contract End Date**: Wednesday, August 31, 2027

### Tender Details
* **Notice Type**: Request for Standing Offer (RFSO) for catering services
* **Procurement Method**: Competitive and open bidding
* **Contracting Entity**: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* **End-User Entity**: Department of National Defence (DND)
* **Regions of Delivery**: Ontario (excluding National Capital Region)

### Additional Information
* **UNSPSC Code**: 90101600 (banquet and catering services)
* **Trade Agreements**: Various free trade agreements, including CFTA, CCPA, ALEU, and others
* **Contact Person**: Crystal Denton (email: crystal.denton@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)

### Tender Documents
The complete tender package can be accessed on the Ariba Discovery portal using the following URL:
https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/19528531?extsite=MTk1Mjg1MzFfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==

Note: I removed unnecessary text and reorganized the information to make it more concise and easier to read. I also corrected minor errors in grammar and punctuation.
## End. ##
